item.title: Call A Spade A Spade
item.author: me@mwop.net (Matthew Weier O'Phinney)
item.dc:creator: Matthew Weier O'Phinney
item.content:encoded: I don't often get political on my blog, or over social media. But those of you who follow me on twitter lately have been treated to a number of tweets and retweets from me about some bills before the US legislative bodies called "SOPA" and "PIPA". Over the last couple days, I realized exactly why I disagree with them, and felt 140 characters is not enough.
